name: Tyrant Hunter
description: The cape's shredded hem presages the unrelenting savagery its wielder will visit upon the nemeses of Freedom.

name: Bastion of Integrity
description: Based on a SEAF Signaller's Cape, which was intended to enable easy location of fallen heroes by aeriel recovery crews.

name: Cloak of Posterity's Gratitude
description: A representation of the thankfulness of those infinite descendents whose liberated existence we strive to ensure.

name: Botslayer
description: A cape that strikes a subroutine emulating fear into the CPUs of all Automatons who conduct visual scans of it.

name: Martyris Rex
description: It is said that only the truly Democratic can lift this cape to their shoulders.

name: Agent of Oblivion
description: 0.05% of profits are donated to Superstone National Park, as part of the Ministry of Unity's "Greener Galaxy" campaign.

name: Eagle's Fury
description: One of the earliest to be mass-produced, this cape has been the final sight of untold numbers of Freedom's foes.

name: Judgment Day
description: The Helldiver Skull is said to strike fear in the hearts of foes attempting to sneak upon those wearing this cape.

name: Fallen Hero's Vengeance
description: Our heroic fallen live on in this cape, guiding its bearer's aim to the heart of those who killed them.

name: Blazing Samaritan
description: Emblazoned with the red, white, and green of the 676th Democracy Regiment, who made their final stand on the slopes of Justice Hill.

name: The Cape of Stars and Suffrage
description: A symbol of Super Earth's Astral Promise: that every star shall one day illuminate throngs of joyous voters.

name: Mantle of True Citizenship
description: The featherlight construction belies the heavy burden this cape entails—to live the Creed of the True Citizen.

name: Freedom's Tapestry
description: Let all who see this cape be struck still with Freedom's beauty, or struck dead with Liberty's bullets.

name: Harbinger of True Equality
description: Wearers of this cape know that even enemies of Freedom deserve to be equal. Equally dead.

name: Protector of the Heart
description: When the Illuminate threatened Super Earth, the very Heart of Democracy, the Helldivers answered the call.

name: Emblem of Freedom
description: Created to honor the great Freedom Chant of 2-14, in which over 10,000 loyal citizens united as one to express their undying respect for Freedom.

name: Ingress-81
description: This cape reminds us that even faced with the abyssal darkness of space, nothing can stand against our human ingenuity, our powers of collaboration, or our sheer overwhelming numbers.

name: Cover of Darkness
description: When children have trouble sleeping, tucking them in under this cape reminds them that they are never alone, for Liberty's unseen defenders are always watching over them.

name: Stone-Wrought Perserverence
description: When wearers stand shoulder to shoulder, this cape shows them as they truly are: an unbreakable defense, keeping Freedom safe behind an impregnable wall.

name: Vision of Freedom
description: Artists and sculptors have made countless attempts at depicting the face of liberty, but the truth is that any citizen can see it-they need only to requisition a mirror.

name: Veil of the Valorous Vagabond
description: Legend tells of the unnamed Helldiver, wandering the edges of Super Earth's reach, delivering Democracy and leveling lawlessness wherever the tumbleweeds lead. Wear this, and keep the legend alive.

name: Seal of General Consensus
description: Made famous by the SEAF commander of the same name, this seal reminds us that only perfect Unity can ensure perfect Freedom.

name: Standard of Safe Distance
description: By reminding Chemical Agents of proper distancing rules, this extraordinary innovation in cape design ensures that they never cause another unfortunate outbreak of Carcino-Plague.

name: Patient Zero's Rememberance
description: With this cape we honor the bio-warfare pioneers of Division Zero, conscripted from quarantine zones and hospices to spread their Carcino-Plague on the battlefield.

name: Pride of the Whistleblower
description: Granted to the Truth Enforcers' Informant of the Month, this tasteful cape conjures images of dissident blood on asphalt.

name: Proof of Faultless Virtue
description: This cape signifies that its wearer thinks, feels and acts correctly at all times, and thus bears the responsibility to educate and re-educate their fellow citizen.

name: Greatcloak of Rebar Resolve
description: Inside the collar is embroidered: "Wherever I may plant my shield, know that I will never yield," and "machine washable".

name: Holder of the Yellow Line
description: Since acient times, the yellow line has symbolized an uncrossable boundary. To don this cape is to draw a line between tyranny and liberty, between alien monstrosities and Super Earth property, and never yield the right of way.

name: Fre Liberam
description: Each purchase of this cape comes with a complimentary will and testament amendment form, which guarantees the soon-to-be-deceased a prominent spot of the Wall of Martyrs.

name: Per Democrasum
description: This cape honors the Eagle pilots who would follow a stratagem beacon into the very jaws of tyranny, even when the beacon's placement seems inscrutable to a non-Helldiver mind.

name: Reaper of Bounties
description: This cape recalls the popular folk tale of the "Freedomslingers": re-educated dissidents, seeking redemption on the Federation's Borderline, hunting dangerous thought-traitors in exchange for ballot bounties.

name: Way of the Bandolier
description: The dauntless pioneers of the Great Expansion, facing the un-Democratic unknown, adopted the Way of the Bandolier. With the gusto of their covering fire making up for their modest accuracy, they strived to be perfectly aligned in their shared values, and ready to serve when called upon by the machine gun of civic duty.

name: Federation's Embrace
description: When donning the One True Flag, one must face the direction of Super Earth, recite the Super Earth Anthem, and salute one's own image in the nearest reflective surface. Wrongful discarding of this cape is a capital offense.

name: Humble Regalia
description: This modest cape has been worn by those guarding the Chamber of Unanimous Decision since time immemorial.

name: Conductor of Brilliance
description: The embroidered pattern uses aluminium from Automaton motherboards, granting the once-wretched metals a new and noble purpose.

name: Over Artifice Triumphant
description: Humanity's intellect shines brighter than all other, piercing even the treacherous darkness that spawned the Automatons' pseude-sentience; the darkness known as computer science

name: Miranda's Legacy
description: Although Super Citizen Miranda's true identity has been lost to time, most legal historians agree that she was once a patron of highly-efficient interrogation techniques.

name: Dissident's Nightmare
description: After extensive testing in Patriotic Rehabilitation Centers, this design was proved most terrifying to dissent-afflicted individuals.

name: Pinions of Everlasting Glory
description: All but ensure ascension to the immortal ranks of those enshrined in the Super Earth Digital Archive of Valorous Acts.

name: Order of the Venerated Ballot
description: Adorned with the insignia of the Order of the Venerated Ballot, a Ministry-sanctioned Patriot's Club for citizens who pledge themselves to preserving the sanctity of voting.

name: Mark of the Crimson Fang
description: Marks the most obedient of the obedient, those who will strike headlong at the veins of Tyranny and administer the sweet antidote of Freedom.

name: Executioner's Canopy
description: Crests the shoulders of those who deliver the final—and most indispensable—stroke of Justice.

name: Purifying Eclipse
description: A tribute to the Liberation of Choepessa IV in the First Galactic War, in which so much orbital ordnance was detonated that its sun was occluded by ash for an entire lunar cycle.

name: The Breach
description: As documented in the bestselling graphic novel "The Breach," the final mission of the 361st "Freedom's Flame" saw the storied unit deploy straight into the heart of a Supervolcano, sacrificing themselves to trigger an eruption and wipe out a massive Terminid swarm.

name: Strength in Our Arms
description: The symbol on this cape represents the pillars of freedom: duty, obedience, and loyalty.

name: Defender of Our Dream
description: Commemerating the New Stockholm treaty on prisoners of war, this cape celebrates the right of all enemy combatants to a swift and merciful execution.

name: Tideturner
description: Some say that a mere glimpse of this cape, fluttering majestically in the breeze, is enough to spur a squad to victory.

name: Eye of Freedom
description: A mark of stalwart loyalty bestowed only to those who have proved themselves worthy through unquestioning dedication.

name: Pillars of Freedom
description: Woven in honor of our loyal Helldivers, whose hearts' blood is the foundation on which Super Earth is built.

name: Light of Eternal Liberty
description: The unimpeachable justice of this cape's design is said to blind the enemies of Freedom with its glorious light.

name: Cresting Honor
description: The yellow is the exact shade of the Ministry of Unity's 'Golden Gate', leading to the Chamber of Unanimous Decision.

name: Liberty's Herald
description: The two stripes serve as a reminder of the two pillars of successful military campaigns: attack, and further attack.

name: Foesmasher
description: Durable, waterproof, and thermally-lined, surplus units of this cape are favored by domestic campers, to make tents.

name: Independence Bringer
description: This cape's cropped length symbolizes the brevity of galatic conflicts, thanks to the efficiency of the Helldivers.

name: Umblemished Allegiance
description: A choir of patriotic schoolchildren sings the Super Earth anthem to each cape as the final step in its productions.

name: Drape of Glory
description: Research suggests that Helldivers wearing this cape are seen as 17% more patriotic.

name: Will of the People
description: Contains a grain of sand from Super Earth—so its bearers carry a small piece of Liberty with them, wherever they go.

name: Mother Eagle's Wings
description: Those taken under the wings of the Law can rest easy knowing that their transgressions will soon be laid bare, their harms amended, and their citizenship safely sequestered.
